content: Hi, Félix / passcod (cargo-watch) here. Looking for some guidance on PR etiquette for a contribution to std; specifically https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/65225 — I've been asked for a modification and a stabilisation, should that be two PRs or folded into a single one?
@Félix Saparelli since they're related I would suggest putting them in the same pr (but different commits) for now, and the reviewer can ask you to split it up if they prefer
